name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: What's a cute, round and fluffy POKEMON?

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I heard that CLEFAIRY evolves when it's exposed to a MOON STONE.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: I'm a rambling, gambling dude!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: Gambling and POKEMON are like eating peanuts! Just can't stop!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: You need a strategy to win at this!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: Go with GRIMER first...and......and...then...

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: I like NIDORAN, so I collect them!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: When POKEMON grow up they get ugly! They shouldn't evolve!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: School is fun, but so are POKEMON.

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: We're stuck here because of the gates at SAFFRON.

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: MEOWTH is so cute, meow, meow, meow!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I think PIDGEY and RATTATA are cute too!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: We must look silly standing here like this!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: SAFFRON's gate keeper won't let us through. He's so mean!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: All right! Let's roll the dice!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: Lady Luck's not with me today!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: You look good at POKEMON, but how's your chem?

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: I am better at school than this!

name: Guard
Dialogue:
I'm on guard duty. Gee, I'm thirsty, though! Oh wait there,
the road's closed.

name: Signpost
Dialogue:
UNDERGROUND PATH 
CELADON CITY - LAVENDER TOWN
The dept. store in CELADON has a great selection!
I heard a sleepy POKEMON appeared near CELADON CITY.
